sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Preheat oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C). 2. Remove stems from mushrooms and chop them finely. 3. In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. 4. Add minced garlic and chopped mushroom stems, cook until softened. 5. In a bowl, mix cream cheese, grated parmesan cheese, bread crumbs, chopped parsley, cooked mushroom stems, salt, and pepper. 6. Stuff mushroom caps with the cream cheese mixture. 7. Place stuffed mushrooms on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20, until golden brown and bubbly. 8. Serve hot.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Global">eb81cf979755021069a3b6fce053af07</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Mushrooms (12), Cream Cheese (1/2 cup), </ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Appetizer">91508fd39755021069a3b6fce053af8b</meal_type> <name>Stuffed Mushrooms</name> <nutrition>Calories: 200, Protein: 10g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 10g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Remove mushroom stems and chop finely. 2. Mince garlic. 3. Chop parsley.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b4ac87979795021069a3b6fce053afa7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:11</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
